source_description: Feature 028: Purchase Tracking & Enhanced Costing - Implement Purchase entity as first-class transaction record linking products to suppliers with temporal pricing context. Core changes: (1) Purchase table with product_id, supplier_id, purchase_date, unit_price, quantity_purchased, notes; (2) InventoryAddition.purchase_id FK replacing price_paid field; (3) New purchase_service.py with CRUD and price history queries; (4) Updated inventory_service.add_inventory() to create Purchase records; (5) FIFO cost calculation using Purchase.unit_price; (6) UI: Supplier dropdown in Add Inventory dialog with price suggestions.
